# ClarityStack Robots File

User-agent: *
# Allow crawling of public marketing pages
Allow: /

# Block crawling of Admin and Client Portal logic
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /portal/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /install

# Point to Sitemap (Generated by SeoController)
Sitemap: https://yourdomain.com/api/seo/sitemap.xml
